sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_ID , SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBT1.START_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBT1.END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , SUBT1.ORD , SUBT1.PRJ_DESC , SUBT1.USE_CD , SUBT1.DEL_CD , SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID, 'PRJ00013', SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID, 'PRJ00014', SUBT1.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD, '1') AS PRJ_DEV_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_ACRM , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_CD , SUBT1.PRJ_CHILD_CNT , SUBT1.REQ_ALL_CNT , SUBT1.REQ_IN_PROGRESS_CNT , SUBT1.REQ_DONE_CNT , SUBT1.PRJ_USR_CHARGER_LIST , SUBT1.REG_DTM , SUBT1.REG_USR_ID , SUBT1.REG_USR_IP , SUBT1.MODIFY_DTM , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_NM , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.ORD , A.PRJ_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.DEL_CD , A.PRJ_TYPE_CD , A.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , A.PRJ_ACRM , A.PRJ_GRP_CD , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRJ1000 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_CHILD_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS REQ_ALL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '02') AS REQ_IN_PROGRESS_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04') AS REQ_DONE_CNT , ( SELECT WM_CONCAT(Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD || '|' || Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID || '|' || Y.USR_IMG_ID || '|' ||Y.USR_NM) FROM PRJ1001 Z INNER JOIN STM3000 Y ON(Y.USR_ID = Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID AND Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Y.USE_CD = '01' AND Y.BLOCK = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) AS PRJ_USR_CHARGER_LIST , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND EXISTS ( SELECT P.PRJ_GRP_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT X.PRJ_GRP_ID FROM PRJ2001 Z INNER JOIN PRJ2000 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = Y.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 X ON (X.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND X.USE_CD = '01') UNION SELECT Z.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1001 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID = #usrId# ) P WHERE 1=1 AND P.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_CD = #prjGrpCd#
AND SUBT1.USE_CD = #useCd#
AND SUBT1.DEL_CD = #delCd#
AND SUBT1.PRJ_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT1.START_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#searchTargetData#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD')
AND SUBT1.END_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#searchTargetData#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD')
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY SUBT1.ORD, SUBT1.PRJ_NM
) SUBT2

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF , SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_ID , SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBT1.START_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBT1.END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , SUBT1.ORD , SUBT1.PRJ_DESC , SUBT1.USE_CD , SUBT1.DEL_CD , SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID, 'PRJ00013', SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID, 'PRJ00014', SUBT1.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD, '1') AS PRJ_DEV_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_ACRM , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_CD , SUBT1.REG_DTM , SUBT1.REG_USR_ID , SUBT1.REG_USR_IP , SUBT1.MODIFY_DTM , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_NM , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.ORD , A.PRJ_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.DEL_CD , A.PRJ_TYPE_CD , A.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , A.PRJ_ACRM , A.PRJ_GRP_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1000 A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ2001 Z INNER JOIN PRJ2000 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = Y.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID ) B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND ((A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01') OR (A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '02' AND B.PRJ_ID IS NOT NULL)) ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1 AND SUBT1.USE_CD = '01' CONNECT BY PRIOR SUBT1.PRJ_ID = SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_ID START WITH SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_ID IS NULL ORDER SIBLINGS BY SUBT1.ORD, SUBT1.PRJ_NM ) SUBT2 WHERE 1=1 AND LEAF = (CASE SUBT2.PRJ_GRP_CD WHEN '01' THEN 0 WHEN '02' THEN 1 END)

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUBT2.* FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_START_DT , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_END_DT , SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBT1.START_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBT1.END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , SUBT1.ORD , SUBT1.PRJ_DESC , SUBT1.USE_CD , SUBT1.DEL_CD , SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID, 'PRJ00013', SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID, 'PRJ00014', SUBT1.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD, '1') AS PRJ_DEV_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.PRJ_ACRM , SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_CD , SUBT1.PRJ_BG_COLOR , SUBT1.PRJ_COLOR , SUBT1.REQ_ALL_CNT , SUBT1.REQ_IN_PROGRESS_CNT , SUBT1.REQ_DONE_CNT , SUBT1.PRJ_USR_CHARGER_LIST , SUBT1.REG_DTM , SUBT1.REG_USR_ID , SUBT1.REG_USR_IP , SUBT1.MODIFY_DTM , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , C.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM , C.START_DT AS PRJ_GRP_START_DT , C.END_DT AS PRJ_GRP_END_DT , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_NM , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.ORD , A.PRJ_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.DEL_CD , A.PRJ_TYPE_CD , A.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , A.PRJ_ACRM , A.PRJ_GRP_CD , A.PRJ_BG_COLOR , A.PRJ_COLOR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS REQ_ALL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '02') AS REQ_IN_PROGRESS_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04') AS REQ_DONE_CNT , ( SELECT WM_CONCAT(Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD || '|' || Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID || '|' || Y.USR_IMG_ID || '|' ||Y.USR_NM) FROM PRJ1001 Z INNER JOIN STM3000 Y ON(Y.USR_ID = Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID AND Y.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Y.USE_CD = '01' AND Y.BLOCK = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) AS PRJ_USR_CHARGER_LIST , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1000 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ2001 Z INNER JOIN PRJ2000 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = Y.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID ) B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON( C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND C.DEL_CD = '02' ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUBT1.USE_CD = #useCd#
AND SUBT1.DEL_CD = #delCd#
AND SUBT1.PRJ_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUBT1.PRJ_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT1.START_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#searchTargetData#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD')
AND SUBT1.END_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#searchTargetData#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD')
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY SUBT1.ORD, SUBT1.REG_DTM DESC
) SUBT2

SELECT ROWNUM RN, SUBT2.AUTH_TYPE_CD, SUBT2.AUTH_TYPE_NM, SUBT2.LIC_GRP_ID, SUBT2.PRJ_ID, SUBT2.USR_ID, SUBT2.USR_NM, SUBT2.EMAIL, SUBT2.TELNO, SUBT2.USR_IMG_ID, SUBT2.DEPT_ID, SUBT2.DEPT_NAME, SUBT2.USR_POSITION_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', SUBT2.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM, SUBT2.USR_DUTY_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', SUBT2.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.*, SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00018', SUBT1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '1') AS AUTH_TYPE_NM FROM ( SELECT '01' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD, B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD, A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID AS USR_ID, B.USR_NM, B.EMAIL, B.TELNO, B.USR_IMG_ID, B.DEPT_ID, SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, B.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME, B.USR_POSITION_CD, B.USR_DUTY_CD FROM PRJ1001 A INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.USR_ID = A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DEL_CD = '02' AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.BLOCK = '01' AND A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' UNION SELECT '02' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD, B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD, A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID AS USR_ID, B.AUTH_GRP_NM AS USR_NM, '' AS EMAIL, '' AS TELNO, '' AS USR_IMG_ID, '' AS DEPT_ID, '' AS DEPT_NM, '' AS USR_POSITION_CD, '' AS USR_DUTY_CD FROM PRJ1001 A INNER JOIN PRJ2000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND B.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '02' ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUBT1.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = #prjAuthTypeCd#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY DECODE(SUBT1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '02', 1, '01', 2), SUBT1.USR_NM, SUBT1.USR_POSITION_CD DESC, SUBT1.USR_DUTY_CD DESC
) SUBT2 WHERE 1=1
AND SUBT2.USR_POSITION_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT2.USR_DUTY_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT2.USR_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT2.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUBT2.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'

SELECT ROWNUM RN, SUBT2.AUTH_TYPE_CD, SUBT2.AUTH_TYPE_NM, SUBT2.LIC_GRP_ID, SUBT2.USR_ID, SUBT2.USR_NM, SUBT2.EMAIL, SUBT2.TELNO, SUBT2.USR_IMG_ID, SUBT2.DEPT_ID, SUBT2.DEPT_NAME, SUBT2.USR_POSITION_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', SUBT2.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM, SUBT2.USR_DUTY_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', SUBT2.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM FROM ( SELECT SUBT1.*, SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'PRJ00018', SUBT1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '1') AS AUTH_TYPE_NM FROM ( SELECT '01' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD, A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.USR_ID, A.USR_NM, A.EMAIL, A.TELNO, A.USR_IMG_ID, A.DEPT_ID, SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME, A.USR_POSITION_CD, A.USR_DUTY_CD FROM STM3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.BLOCK = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID FROM PRJ1001 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID = A.USR_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) UNION SELECT '02' AS AUTH_TYPE_CD, A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_ID AS USR_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_NM AS USR_NM, '' AS EMAIL, '' AS TELNO, '' AS USR_IMG_ID, '' AS DEPT_ID, '' AS DEPT_NM, '' AS USR_POSITION_CD, '' AS USR_DUTY_CD FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID FROM PRJ1001 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '02' AND Z.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUBT1.AUTH_TYPE_CD = #prjAuthTypeCd#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY DECODE(SUBT1.AUTH_TYPE_CD, '02', 1, '01', 2), SUBT1.USR_NM
) SUBT2 WHERE 1=1
AND SUBT2.USR_POSITION_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT2.USR_DUTY_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT2.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUBT2.USR_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND SUBT2.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId#
ORDER BY T1.ORD ASC

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId#
ORDER BY T1.ORD ASC

SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD, A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID, B.USR_NM, B.USR_IMG_ID, B.EMAIL FROM PRJ1001 A INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON (B.USR_ID = A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.BLOCK = '01') INNER JOIN ( SELECT Y.LIC_GRP_ID, X.PRJ_GRP_ID FROM PRJ2001 Z INNER JOIN PRJ2000 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = Y.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 X ON (X.PRJ_ID = Z.PRJ_ID AND X.USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Y.LIC_GRP_ID, X.PRJ_GRP_ID ) C ON (C.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01'
SELECT * FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01'
SELECT * FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '02'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_PRJ_GRP_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_PRJ_GRP_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'GRP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_PRJ_GRP_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(PRJ_ID) AS NEW_PRJ_GRP_ID FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID LIKE 'GRP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '01' )
INSERT INTO PRJ1000 ( PRJ_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_NM , START_DT , END_DT , ORD , PRJ_DESC , USE_CD , DEL_CD , PRJ_TYPE_CD , PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , PRJ_GRP_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #newPrjGrpId# , NULL , #licGrpId# , #prjNm# , REPLACE(#startDt#, '-', '') , REPLACE(#endDt#, '-', '') , #ord# , #prjDesc# , #useCd# , '02' , #prjTypeCd# , #prjDevTypeCd# , #prjGrpCd# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_PRJ_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_PRJ_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'PRJ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_PRJ_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(PRJ_ID) AS NEW_PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID LIKE 'PRJ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' AND A.PRJ_GRP_CD = '02' )
INSERT INTO PRJ1000 ( PRJ_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_NM , START_DT , END_DT , ORD , PRJ_DESC , USE_CD , DEL_CD , PRJ_TYPE_CD , PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD , PRJ_ACRM , PRJ_GRP_CD , PRJ_BG_COLOR , PRJ_COLOR , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #newPrjId# , #prjGrpId# , #licGrpId# , #prjNm# , REPLACE(#startDt#, '-', '') , REPLACE(#endDt#, '-', '') , #ord# , #prjDesc# , #useCd# , '02' , #prjTypeCd# , #prjDevTypeCd# , #prjAcrm# , #prjGrpCd# , #prjBgColor# , #prjColor# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PRJ1000 A SET PRJ_NM = #prjNm# , START_DT = REPLACE(#startDt#, '-', '') , END_DT = REPLACE(#endDt#, '-', '') , ORD = #ord# , PRJ_DESC = #prjDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , PRJ_ACRM = #prjAcrm#
, PRJ_TYPE_CD = #prjTypeCd#
, PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD = #prjDevTypeCd#
, PRJ_GRP_CD = #prjGrpCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
UPDATE PRJ1000 A SET A.DEL_CD = #delCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PRJ1000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ACRM = #prjAcrm#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM3000 SET PRJ_ID = NULL WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.PRJ_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_ID , B.PRJ_NM , NVL(B.PRJ_DESC,' ') AS PRJ_DESC , B.PRJ_TYPE_CD , B.PRJ_DEV_TYPE_CD FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT Z.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ2000 Z, PRJ2001 X WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = X.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = X.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_TYP = '02' AND Z.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND USR_ID = #usrId# ) A, PRJ1000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY B.ORD
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_PRJ_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_PRJ_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'PRJ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_PRJ_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(PRJ_ID) AS NEW_PRJ_ID FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID LIKE 'PRJ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO PRJ1000 ( PRJ_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_NM , START_DT , END_DT , ORD , PRJ_DESC , USE_CD , PRJ_TYPE , PRJ_ACRM , PRJ_GRP_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #newPrjId# , #wizrd_prjGrpId# , #licGrpId# , #wizard_prjNm# , REPLACE(#wizard_startDt#, '-', '') , REPLACE(#wizard_endDt#, '-', '') , #wizard_ord# , #wizard_prjDesc# , '01' , #wizard_prjType# , #wizard_prjAcrm# , '02' , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )

INSERT INTO PRJ1001 ( PRJ_ID, PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD, PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID , REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #prjId#, #prjAuthTypeCd#, #prjAuthTargetId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM PRJ1001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.PRJ_AUTH_TYPE_CD = #prjAuthTypeCd#
AND A.PRJ_AUTH_TARGET_ID = #prjAuthTargetId#
